import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; import { UserStoreService } from 'src/app/services/user-store.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent implements OnInit { @Input() role!: string; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }
